name: geo_org
sql:
(ip) -> 
    multiIf(
        isIPv4String(ip), dictGetString('maxmind_geoip_asn_blocks_ipv4', 
                                        'autonomous_system_organization', 
                                        tuple(IPv4StringToNumOrDefault(toString(    assumeNotNull(ip))))),
        isIPv6String(ip), dictGetString('maxmind_geoip_asn_blocks_ipv6', 
                                        'autonomous_system_organization', 
                                        tuple(IPv6StringToNumOrDefault(toString(    assumeNotNull(ip))))),
        NULL
    )
